alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 2:20AM MST until December 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Most of northeast Montana. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
